statements: SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE conversions > 0 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, conversions FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE click_through_rates > 0.5;
SELECT link_id, revenue FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE affiliate_id = 100 AND click_through_rates < 0.3 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE affiliate_id = 1 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT id, conversions, revenue FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE affiliate_id = 2 LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT affiliate_id, click_through_rates, revenue FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE click_through_rates > 0.5 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE revenue > 1000 AND click_through_rates < 0.3;
SELECT affiliate_id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING total_conversions > 10 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM affiliate_marketers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT affiliate_id, clicks, purchases FROM affiliate_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, revenue FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, affiliate_link FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE conversions > 50 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT name, email, revenue FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE click_through_rate >= 0.3 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, affiliate_link, revenue FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE revenue > 1000 AND (click_through_rate < 0.3 OR conversions < 20) ORDER BY conversions DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT name, conversions, revenue, click_through_rate FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE revenue BETWEEN 500 AND 10000 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC, conversions ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND amount_spent > 500 ORDER BY activity_date ASC, amount_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT affiliate_id, click_count FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_count > 100
SELECT affiliate_id, conversion_count FROM conversions WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT affiliate_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue ORDER BY revenue_date ASC
SELECT affiliate_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING total_revenue > 500
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_count > 100 ORDER BY click_date DESC
SELECT affiliate_id, SUM(conversion_count) FROM conversions GROUP BY affiliate_id
SELECT affiliate_id, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING avg_revenue > 500

SELECT affiliate_id, conversion_count, revenue_amount FROM conversions c JOIN revenue r ON c.affiliate_id = r.affiliate_id WHERE r.revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC, conversion_count ASC
SELECT c.click_date, r.revenue_date FROM click_through_rates c JOIN revenue r ON c.affiliate_id = r.affiliate_id WHERE r.revenue_amount > 500 ORDER BY c.click_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ClickThroughRates;
SELECT affiliate_id, click_date FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT affiliate_id, conversion_date, conversion_amount FROM Conversions ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, revenue_amount FROM Revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, link_url FROM AffiliateLinks WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, affiliate_id, click_date FROM ClickThroughRates ORDER BY click_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT affiliate_id, conversion_date, conversion_amount FROM Conversions WHERE affiliate_id = 5;
SELECT affiliate_id, revenue_amount, revenue_date FROM Revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 100 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT id, affiliate_id, link_url FROM AffiliateLinks ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, affiliate_id, link_id FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE affiliate_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM AffiliateLinks;
SELECT link_url, revenue FROM AffiliateLinks;
SELECT affiliate_id, affiliate_name FROM Affiliates ORDER BY affiliate_name DESC;
SELECT click_id, click_location FROM Clicks WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT conversion_id, affiliate_id, conversion_amount FROM Conversions WHERE conversion_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM AffiliateLinks ORDER BY revenue DESC, conversions ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT affiliate_name, website_url FROM Affiliates WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Clicks WHERE click_location IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, AVG(conversion_amount) AS average_conversion_amount FROM Conversions GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING AVG(conversion_amount) > 50;
SELECT c.*, a.affiliate_name FROM Clicks c INNER JOIN Affiliates a ON c.affiliate_id = a.affiliate_id;
